Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to txt msg break up with %r%
%i% txt msg broke up with %r% which was yet another lame thing %prons(i,he/she)% did
%r% didn't realize %i% %pron(i,was/were)% trying to txt msg breakup
%i% txt msg brokeup with %r% even though it was kind of over already
%r% thought %o% sent that txt msg breakup text from %i%
%i% txt msg brokeup with %r% at the worst possible moment
%i% txt msg Brett Favred up with %r%
%i% played off the text message break up with %r% as a joke
%i% accidently sent %o% a text message meant for %r%
%i% broke up with %r% because of the cheating
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% too desperate to believe that %is% really wanted to break up with %pron(r,him/her)%
%i% used %pron(i,his/her)% breakup text message with %r% as an intro to a joke
%i% couldn't bother breaking up with %r% to %pron(r,his/her)% face
%i% used text messages to break up with %r%
%r% used %pron(r,his/her)% looks to shoot down %ip% text message break up

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... uh... hi, %r%. %rand(Is your phone on?,Have you checked your texts lately?,Have you uh...)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %sweetie%. Oh wait, hang on, someone's texting me.
OMG! Did you just txt msg breakup with me?!
That is so lame. I can't believe what a %pejorative% you are. I just removed you from my contact list.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... uh... hi, %r%. I sent you a text, did you get it yet?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %sweetie%, %random(that's so sweet that you get so excited about me reading your texts. I like to save them up and read them all at once,I lost my charger and my phone's been dead all week so I wrote you some letters instead,I don't like to read your texts right away... I just let my phone vibrate all day to remind me of you)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: .....That's, uh..... that's %positiveadj%. Um, I should go.
%greeting%. Hey, so, I sent you a text, uh, have you like, gotten it or whatever?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Text message breakup, %i%, real classy.
I guess I shouldn't expect anything less from you after %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's not like that all. And that was like a million years ago anyway.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whatever. We're so over.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... uh... hi, %r%. I sent you a text, did you get it yet?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I totally did. Like someone as funny as you would srsly be so lame as to text message breakup.
This reminds me of that time when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What? It's not like that at all.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're such a kidder, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. Hey, so, I sent you a text, uh, have you like, gotten it or whatever?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. I texted you back already, did you get that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, no... what does it say?
Oh. So....?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I was totally over you anyway.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, %r%, what's up. So like, I sent you a text, did you get it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that. Whatever, like you seriously expect me to believe you sent that? I saw you talking to %o% earlier. Is this %gender(o,his,her)% idea of a joke?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, no... I sent the text. srsly.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Seriously not funny. I'd expect this sort of uncool prank from %o%, but not from you. Hey, are we still going to that thing later?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhh..... I guess.
%greeting%. Hey, so, I sent you a text, uh, have you like, gotten it or whatever?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Yeah, I got it. Thanks a lot, %pejorative%, for making my worst day ever even worse.
I was already feeling %cat(r,feeling bad)%. Is that seriously how you break up, in a crappy text?
That's not even how you spell 'abstinence' by the way.
Whatever. Get a life, jerk.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. Hey, so, I sent you a text, uh, have you like, gotten it or whatever?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, yeah. It was totally confusing. What do you mean you want to 'Brett Favre' up with me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, I think that was autocomplete. I meant 'break' up.
Hey %i%! did you get my text?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I didn't really get it. Was it supposed to be a joke?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... yeah, you weren't suppose to read it until I got here...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What was all the stuff about breaking up. I didn't find that very funny.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, uh, it would 've been funnier if you heard the punchline.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, guess you should plan out your jokes better next time. I almost thought you were breaking up with me through joke text.
That would be *so* lame for anyone to do that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I guess that would be lame...
Hey %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is this text you just sent me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It says... I had a great time earlier. You are so much better then %r%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, that wasn't meant for you...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well if this is your way of breaking up with me then you got it %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Guess that's less baggage for me.

Instantiation.name: TxtBreakUp - Cheating on with Homewrecker involved

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, you get my text?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... The one that just asked what I was doing later?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wait, that wasn't the one I sent you...

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hey %i%! Why did you send me a text about breaking up with me?!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %sweetie%! That wasn't meant for you. It was meant for %r%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You were trying to break up with me?!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, would've went a lot better if you just got the right text in the first place...
Come on %o%, let's ditch this %gender(r,dude,chick)%. What were you doing later by the way?
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, I got you're text but it was really long so I didn't bother reading it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Let me sum it up for you then.
You are a cheating %pejorative% and I never want to see you again!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why didn't you just text me that then?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I could have, but I thought I would at least give you some time to feel bad about this.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nah, fresh out of feeling bad. Guess that's it for us, see ya!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That went differently in my head...
You happen to get any texts from me... like recently...?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: How could I miss a text from you?! Let me check right away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh oh.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, this can't be!
Please give me another chance... I'll do anything for it!
I'll feed any dogs you have, play with any siblings you have, clean any cars you have. ANYTHING!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I guess we can stay together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes! You won't regret it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%! Did you get my text?
Make sure to read it out loud.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not yet, let me go check it.
Who has two arms and wants to break up with you?
I don't get it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm breaking up with you.
Geez, way to ruin the joke.
Hey %r%. Look, I really shouldn't be seen talking to you in public any more, so I thought I would just text you what I want to say instead.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm, okay?
I'm sorry I can't be seen with you.
This is it for us. Maybe if you are one day popular%if(0, again)% things can be different.
No buts, this is how it has to go. Good bye.
What? Oh my phone.
Hey %r%, I need to talk to you?
Did you just text me this?
Yes, I think this will be easier for both of us.
I'm breaking up with you, you aren't my type.
Frown face, good bye.
Well that sucks. At least that was clearer than if you tried to speak it to me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %sweetie%, you get any texts from me recently?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I think I did.
Let me slowly pose as I go get my phone out.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What a body! What am I doing? Why did I send that text?
Look, you probably shouldn't read it actually. I didn't mean to send it to you.
I'm sorry, I didn't mean it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You better not mean it, or else you'll never see this body again.
